Title: Importance of Comment Management
Content: Managing comments on Xiaohongshu is crucial for maintaining the reputation of your posts and products. Comments on Xiaohongshu serve as the primary form of feedback since the platform does not have a separate section for product reviews. Positive comments can enhance the credibility of your product, while negative comments can deter potential buyers. Therefore, it is essential to monitor and manage comments actively. You can delete inappropriate or false comments and even block users who consistently post negative feedback without valid reasons. Additionally, you can guide the conversation in the comments by using secondary accounts to ask questions and provide helpful responses. This interaction can increase engagement and conversion rates. However, it is important to avoid artificially inflating comments, likes, or followers, as this can disrupt the algorithm and negatively impact your post's visibility.

Title: Strategies for Reposting Successful Notes
Content: When a note on Xiaohongshu becomes popular, it is beneficial to repost it multiple times to maximize its reach and impact. The success of a note could be due to various factors such as the quality of the video, the appeal of the cover image, or the popularity of the product featured. By reposting the successful note, you can continue to attract attention and drive sales. To keep the content fresh, consider changing the cover image, title, or even the introduction and conclusion of the video. This approach helps in maintaining the interest of your audience and can lead to higher engagement rates. Reposting also allows you to test different variations and identify which elements contribute most to the note's success. Consistent reposting of successful notes can significantly enhance your visibility and sales on the platform.

Title: Avoiding Artificial Engagement
Content: On Xiaohongshu, maintaining authenticity is key to long-term success. Artificially inflating engagement metrics such as likes, comments, and followers can disrupt the platform's algorithm and negatively impact your content's visibility. Xiaohongshu's algorithm is designed to promote genuine interactions and high-quality content. When you artificially boost engagement, you risk confusing the algorithm, which can lead to a decrease in the visibility of your posts. Instead, focus on creating high-quality, engaging content that naturally attracts interaction. Encourage genuine comments and likes by providing valuable information and engaging with your audience. Authentic engagement not only helps in building a loyal follower base but also ensures that your content is promoted to a wider audience. By avoiding artificial engagement, you can maintain the integrity of your account and achieve sustainable growth on the platform.
